wblut.hemesh

Class HE_Selection

  • java.lang.Object
    • wblut.hemesh.HE_Element
      • wblut.hemesh.HE_MeshStructure
        • wblut.hemesh.HE_Selection
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    WB_HasData

    public class HE_Selection
extends HE_MeshStructure
    Collection of mesh elements. Contains methods to manipulate selections
    Author:
    Frederik Vanhoutte (W:Blut)
